mapper.update:
update commodity
commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_describe = #{commodityDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_type = #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_brand = #{commodityBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
on_sale = #{onSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
on_conversion = #{onConversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
conversion_coin = #{conversionCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conversion_ticket = #{conversionTicket,jdbcType=INTEGER},
conversion_price = #{conversionPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
sale_start_datetime = #{saleStartDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sale_end_datetime = #{saleEndDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
carousel_pic1 = #{carouselPic1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carousel_pic2 = #{carouselPic2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carousel_pic3 = #{carouselPic3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update commodity set commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_describe = #{commodityDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_type = #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_brand = #{commodityBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_sale = #{onSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, on_conversion = #{onConversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conversion_coin = #{conversionCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conversion_ticket = #{conversionTicket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conversion_price = #{conversionPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sale_start_datetime = #{saleStartDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sale_end_datetime = #{saleEndDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carousel_pic1 = #{carouselPic1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic2 = #{carouselPic2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic3 = #{carouselPic3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic4 = #{carouselPic4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic5 = #{carouselPic5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, detail = #{detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update commodity set commodity_name = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_describe = #{commodityDescribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, specification = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_type = #{commodityType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_brand = #{commodityBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, discount = #{discount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, on_sale = #{onSale,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, on_conversion = #{onConversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conversion_coin = #{conversionCoin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conversion_ticket = #{conversionTicket,jdbcType=INTEGER}, conversion_price = #{conversionPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, sale_start_datetime = #{saleStartDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, sale_end_datetime = #{saleEndDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, carousel_pic1 = #{carouselPic1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic2 = #{carouselPic2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic3 = #{carouselPic3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic4 = #{carouselPic4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, carousel_pic5 = #{carouselPic5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT t_c.commodity_id AS commodityId, t_c.commodity_name AS commodityName, t_c.commodity_type AS commodityType, t_t.type_name AS commodityTypeValue, t_c.commodity_brand AS commodityBrand, t_b.brand_name_chi AS brandNameChi, t_b.brand_name_eng AS brandNameEng, t_b.logo_url AS brandLogo, t_c.specification, t_c.price, t_c.sale_price AS salePrice, t_c.conversion_coin AS conversionCoin, t_c.conversion_price AS conversionPrice, t_c.inventory, t_c.on_sale AS onSale, CASE t_c.on_sale WHEN '0' THEN '在售' WHEN '1' THEN '停售' ELSE '' END AS onSaleValue, t_c.on_conversion AS onConversion, CASE t_c.on_conversion WHEN '0' THEN '不可兑换' WHEN '1' THEN '可兑换' ELSE '' END AS onConversionValue, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(t_c.sale_start_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'不限') AS saleStart, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(t_c.sale_end_datetime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'),'不限') AS saleEnd, IFNULL(t_sale.saleCount,0) AS saleCount, t_c.carousel_pic1 AS carouselPic1, t_c.carousel_pic2 AS carouselPic2, t_c.carousel_pic3 AS carouselPic3, t_c.carousel_pic4 AS carouselPic4, t_c.carousel_pic5 AS carouselPic5, t_c.detail FROM commodity t_c LEFT JOIN commodity_brand t_b ON t_c.commodity_brand = t_b.brand_id LEFT JOIN commodity_type t_t ON t_c.commodity_type = t_t.type_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT commodity_id, COUNT(1) AS saleCount FROM order_pay WHERE order_status = '2' AND commodity_type = '0' AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY commodity_id ) t_sale ON t_c.commodity_id = t_sale.commodity_id WHERE t_c.commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
